title: Rihanna’s Savage x Fenty Is Now on Amazon — and It’s 30 Percent Off Today
text:
20 items in this article 20 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the vendor

Rihanna’s size-inclusive (and super-fun) lingerie brand, Savage x Fenty, is now officially available on Amazon, which is pretty big news on its own. The even bigger surprise is that everything is 30 percent off, including a rainbow’s worth of microfiber underwear, a matching Savage x Fenty–branded cotton set, cute unlined bralettes, and leopard lace on everything — and all in a variety of sizes. If you see something you like, don’t dillydally: This sale ends today.
